title: WebhookDelivery
description: Defines the HTTP contract for exporting SafeKeyRecorder session logs with explicit user consent.

body.description: Raw contents of session_log.txt encoded as UTF-8 text.

successResponse.description: The webhook accepted the log for processing.

failureResponses.description: Request was invalid (e.g., missing Authorization header, malformed payload).
Remote service experienced an unexpected error; client should surface retry option.
